item.title: V2 API ä»ç°æœ‰åŠ©æ‰‹ä¸­æ£€ç´¢æ¶ˆæ¯
item.description:
ç›®å‰æ­£åœ¨å°è¯•æ£€ç´¢ Assistant V2 æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œä½†ç›®å‰æ ¹æœ¬æ— æ³•è·å–åŠ©æ‰‹æ¶ˆæ¯ã€‚å°è¯•äº†å‡ ä¸ªé€‰é¡¹ï¼Œä½†æ— æ³•å¼„æ¸…æ¥šå¦‚ä½•å®Œæˆæ­¤ä»£ç ã€‚ Python3 import os import openai from dotenv import load_dotenv
# ä» .env æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ load_dotenv()
# è®¾ç½® API å¯†é’¥ openai.api_key = os.getenv('OPENAI_API_KEY')
# ä»ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ä¸­æ£€ç´¢åŠ©æ‰‹ ID assistant_id = os.getenv('ASSISTANT_ID')
# æ£€ç´¢åŠ©æ‰‹ my_assistant = openai.beta.assistants.retrieve(assistant_id) print(f"è¿™æ˜¯åŠ©æ‰‹å¯¹è±¡ï¼š{my_assistant.id} \n")
# åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ my_thread = openai.beta.threads.create() print(f"è¿™æ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡ï¼š{my_thread.id} \n")
# å‘çº¿ç¨‹æ·»åŠ æ¶ˆæ¯ my_thread_message = openai.beta.threads.messages.create( thread_id=my_thread.id, role="user", content="TRYTRYTRYTRY", ) print(f"è¿™æ˜¯æ¶ˆæ¯å¯¹è±¡ï¼š{my_thread_message} \n")
# è¿è¡ŒåŠ©æ‰‹ my_run = openai.beta.threads.runs.create( thread_id=my_thread.id, assistant_id=my_assistant.id, ) print(f"è¿™æ˜¯è¿è¡Œå¯¹è±¡ï¼š{my_run} \n")
my_run = client.beta.threads.runs.retrieve( thread_id=my_thread.id, run_id=my_run.run_id, )
